statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_campaigns_impact;
SELECT campaign_name, mentions_count FROM social_media_campaigns_impact ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaigns_impact WHERE shares_count > 100;
SELECT brand_awareness_rating, reputation_rating FROM social_media_campaigns_impact WHERE mentions_count < 50;
SELECT campaign_name, shares_count, brand_awareness_rating FROM social_media_campaigns_impact ORDER BY brand_awareness_rating DESC, shares_count ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, mentions_count, shares_count FROM social_media_campaigns_impact WHERE brand_awareness_rating > 4 ORDER BY mentions_count DESC
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaigns_impact WHERE reputation_rating < 3
SELECT campaign_name, shares_count, brand_awareness_rating FROM social_media_campaigns_impact WHERE mentions_count > 100 ORDER BY brand_awareness_rating ASC
SELECT campaign_id, reputation_rating FROM social_media_campaigns_impact WHERE shares_count > 50 AND brand_awareness_rating > 2
SELECT campaign_name, reputation_rating FROM social_media_campaigns_impact WHERE brand_awareness_rating < 3 ORDER BY reputation_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM social_media_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM campaign_metrics WHERE brand_awareness_score > 8;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, mentions, shares, reputation_score FROM campaign_metrics;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE 'Summer%' ORDER BY end_date ASC

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, mentions, shares FROM social_media_campaigns JOIN campaign_metrics ON social_media_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_metrics.campaign_id WHERE mentions > 1000 ORDER BY shares DESC

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, brand_awareness_score, reputation_score FROM social_media_campaigns JOIN campaign_metrics ON social_media_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_metrics.campaign_id WHERE brand_awareness_score > 8.0 AND reputation_score > 7.5
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY budget DESC
SELECT * FROM BrandAwareness;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns;
SELECT brand_id, reputation_score FROM Reputation WHERE reputation_score > 80;
SELECT mentions, shares FROM BrandAwareness WHERE shares < 100;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM BrandAwareness WHERE shares > 100 ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, reputation_score FROM Campaigns JOIN Reputation ON Campaigns.campaign_id = Reputation.brand_id WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT brand_id, COUNT(*) AS total_mentions FROM BrandAwareness GROUP BY brand_id HAVING total_mentions > 5 ORDER BY total_mentions DESC;
SELECT MIN(reputation_score), MAX(reputation_score), AVG(shares) FROM Reputation JOIN BrandAwareness ON Reputation.brand_id = BrandAwareness.campaign_id;
SELECT DISTINCT brand_id, COUNT(DISTINCT reputation_score) AS unique_scores FROM Reputation GROUP BY brand_id HAVING unique_scores > 2 ORDER BY brand_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns;
SELECT mention_id, mention_date, mention_text FROM Mentions WHERE campaign_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Shares WHERE share_platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT metric_date, brand_awareness_score, brand_reputation_score FROM BrandMetrics WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns;
SELECT * FROM BrandMetrics WHERE brand_awareness_score > 80;
SELECT user_id, mention_text FROM Mentions WHERE campaign_id = 1 ORDER BY mention_date DESC;

SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, COUNT(*) AS mentions_count FROM Campaigns JOIN Mentions ON Campaigns.campaign_id = Mentions.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY mentions_count DESC;
SELECT brand_reputation_score, AVG(brand_awareness_score) AS avg_awareness_score FROM BrandMetrics GROUP BY brand_reputation_score HAVING AVG(brand_awareness_score) > 50;
SELECT * FROM mentions;
SELECT user_id, mentioned_brand, mention_date FROM mentions WHERE mention_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM brands WHERE industry = 'Fashion';
SELECT user_id, share_date, share_platform, shared_post_url FROM shares ORDER BY share_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM mentions WHERE mentioned_brand = 'Nike';
SELECT * FROM shares WHERE share_platform = 'Twitter' ORDER BY share_date DESC;
SELECT users.username, campaigns.campaign_name FROM users JOIN campaigns ON users.id = campaigns.id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS mentions_count, mentioned_brand FROM mentions GROUP BY mentioned_brand HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT campaigns.*, users.full_name FROM campaigns JOIN users ON campaigns.id = users.id WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
